DOC.criteria: Essential hypertension For female subject , negative serum pregnancy test Ability provide write informed consent Night shift worker whose work hour include midnight 4:00 a.m . Secondary hypertension An arm size precludes use digital blood pressure monitor cuff ( arm size > 42 cm ) Renal dysfunction , severe renal impairment , bilateral renal artery stenosis , renal artery stenosis solitary kidney , subject 1 kidney , postrenal transplant subject Female subject pregnant , plan become pregnant History malignancy within 5 year Primary aldosteronism Heart failure ( NYHA functional class 34 ) , hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy , hemodynamically relevant stenosis aortic mitral valve Significant cardiac arrhythmia , MI , stroke , CABG , PTCA , unstable angina Known hypersensitivity component study drug Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
